meanings.definition: The height of an object or point in relation to sea level or ground level.
meanings.sent1: The airplane reached a high altitude during the flight.
meanings.sent2: The climbers struggled to breathe at such a high altitude.
meanings.sent3: The bird soared gracefully at a great altitude above the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her ambition reached new altitudes as she pursued her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The altitude of the mountain peak took their breath away.

meanings.sent1: The castle was perched at a lofty altitude overlooking the valley.
meanings.sent2: The hot air balloon rose to a breathtaking altitude above the city.
meanings.sent3: The altitude of the treehouse made it a favorite spot for the kids to play.
meanings.sent4: His career reached new altitudes after he received a promotion.
meanings.sent5: The altitude of the skyscraper made it a landmark in the city skyline.
